sources.title: Hamateur Night (1939)
sources.description: Hamateur Night is a 1939 Warner Bros. Merrie Melodies cartoon directed by Tex Avery and written by Jack Miller. The short was released on January 28, 1939 and features an early version of Elmer Fudd. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/hamateur-night-1939/

metadata.Plot: It's amateur night at the local theatre, and a procession of bad acts comes and goes: various musicians, a magician, and some actors. But they keep getting interrupted by Egghead singing "She'll Be Comin' 'Round the Mountain".
metadata.Actors: Elvia Allman, Tex Avery, Sara Berner
